subject: Football
Super Bowl
lead_paragraph: After being involved in the collision that caused the spinal cord injury of Buffalo Bills tight end Kevin Everett, Domenik Hixon became the Giants’ top kick returner in their postseason run.
snippet: After being involved in the collision that caused the spinal cord injury of Buffalo Bills tight end Kevin Everett, Domenik Hixon became the Giants’ top kick returner in their postseason run.
